mapper.select:
select
*
ur_id,ur_password,ur_stopflag
ur_id,ue_willcity,ue_willtype,ue_willmajor,ue_willjob,ue_willlevel
ur_id ,ur_cityname,ue_companyname,ue_companytype,ue_personmajor,ue_personjob,ue_personworkage,ue_companybrand,ur_namenick,ur_sex,ur_imageurl
ur_id,ur_imageurl,ur_namesnd,ue_personjob,ue_personmajor,ue_companyname,ue_companyaddr,ue_companyaddrlocation
ur_id,ur_imageurl,ur_namenick,ur_sex,ur_msgflag2
ur_id,ur_imageurl
ur_id,ur_imageurl,ur_namenick,ue_personjob
ur_id,ur_imageurl,ue_companyname,ur_namenick,ue_personjob
ur_id,ur_namefirst,ue_companytype,ur_sex,ur_namesnd,ue_companyaddr,ue_companylongitude,ue_companylatitude,ue_personworkage,ue_personjob,ue_personlevel,ue_companyunit,ue_companybrand,ue_companyname,ue_personmajor,ue_companyaddrdetailed,ue_companyaddrlocation
ur_id,ur_namenick,ur_imageurl,ue_personjob,ue_personlevel,ue_companyname,ue_personmajor,ue_companybrand,ur_sex
ur_id,ue_companyaddr,ue_companyname
ur_id,Ur_leveltype
ur_id,ur_namenick,ur_imageurl,ue_personmajor,ue_companyname,ue_companyunit,ue_companyaddr,ue_personworkage,ue_personlevel,ue_companybrand,ue_personjob,ur_phone
ur_id,ue_companyname
ur_id,ur_register_date
ur_id,ue_companyname,ur_no
from SysV_UserFull where ur_id = #{ur_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ur_id
,ue_willmajor
from SysV_UserFull where ifnull(ur_stopflag,0)=0
and ur_usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ur_id,ur_no,ue_companyname,ue_companybrand,ue_tagproduct,ue_remark,ur_register_date,ur_namenick,wl_integral from SysV_UserFull where ur_usertype = 3 ORDER BY ur_register_date DESC limit #{pagestart},#{pagesize}
select count(*) from SysV_UserFull where ur_usertype = 3
select count(ur_id) from SysV_UserFull where ur_usertype in (1,2,4)
